# Contributing

## Prerequisites

- [Go](https://golang.org/) 1.17
- [Git](https://git-scm.com/)
- GNU Make
- Unix-ish operating systems

## Clone

```console
$ git clone git@github.com:soracom-labs/openapi-client-python.git
$ cd openapi-client-python
```

## Test

1. Run the whole CI test: `make ci-test`
